overview.note: Plebeian (Kingston, NY) uses the spelling Concklin for John Conklin.

The number of votes for Congress in Ulster County was 2778. Using that figure as a measure for voter turn out, and the reported Federalist majority of 274 given in Plebeian (Kingston, NY), May 2, 1809, the aggregate Assembly vote for each party would be: Federalist, 1526; Republican, 1252; Federalist majority, 274.
